actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the prior law treatment of corporate reorganizations through the exchange of debt instruments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to capital gains and losses, to restore the prior law treatment of corporate reorganizations by providing a special rule for determining issue price in the case of exchange of debt instruments in such reorganizations.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the prior law treatment of corporate reorganizations through the exchange of debt instruments.
